# NSSecureTextField

**Class**

A text field that hides the typed text.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class NSSecureTextField
```

## Overview

A secure text field is suitable for use as a password-entry object or for any item in which the text value must be kept secret. [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSecureTextField] uses [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSecureTextFieldCell] to implement its user interface.

## Views

- **NSTextField**: Text the user can select or edit to send an action message to a target when the user presses the Return key.

## Inherits From

- NSTextField

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
